description: This file defines the ScheduleProvider class, which manages schedules data for a kindergarten management system frontend. It provides methods to load, add, update, and delete schedules by interacting with a DatabaseService. It also offers accessors for schedules filtered by day or class, handles loading state and errors, and notifies listeners about state changes.

classes.name: ScheduleProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages schedule data for the frontend, providing methods to load and modify schedules, and expose data and state indicators.

methods.name: loadSchedules
methods.description: Fetches schedules from the database and updates local list; manages loading state and error handling.

methods.name: addSchedule
methods.description: Adds a new schedule to the database and updates local list; handles loading state and errors.

methods.name: updateSchedule
methods.description: Updates an existing schedule in the database and local list; handles loading state and errors.

methods.name: deleteSchedule
methods.description: Removes a schedule by ID from the database and local list; manages loading and error states.

methods.name: getSchedulesForDay
methods.description: Returns a list of schedules for a specific day of the week, sorted by start time.

methods.name: getSchedulesForClass
methods.description: Returns a list of schedules for a specific class.

methods.name: get_ uniqueClasses
methods.description: Returns a sorted list of unique class names present in the schedules.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Internal method to update loading state and notify listeners.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Clears any current error message and notifies listeners.
